Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class RepositoryController

    • unacloud.RepositoryController

    • This Controller contains actions to manage repository services: crud for repositories. This class render pages for user or process request in services to update entities, there is session verification before all actions only administrator users can call this actions.

      Authors:
      CesarF, Carlos
